item.title: Rich Kid, Poor Kid
item.dc:creator: Sianokie
item.description:
I like to go to work 30 minutes before most people start to arrive. I sit at my desk on the last floor and I take in the great view for 30 uninterrupted minutes. I look down on people as they go about their activities. Sometimes I think to myself, this must be how God...

The post Rich Kid, Poor Kid appeared first on The New Vibes.
